#### Loading Packages
```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("tree_helper_function.R"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("tree_term_climb.R"))
load("environment/brain_sim/yAll.RData")
load("environment/brain_sim/y.RData")
load("environment/brain_sim/tree.RData")
```

print(table(signs, levels))

### Qvalue
```{r}
print("tAfterqval")
print(system.time(tAfterqval <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", minInfRV, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("qvalue"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T)))
save(tAfterqval, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterqval.RData")

print("tAfterqvalNoStop")
print(system.time(tAfterqvalNoStop <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", -100000, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("qvalue"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T, cSign = F)))
save(tAfterqvalNoStop, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterqvalNoStop.RData")

print("tAfterqvalNoThresh")
print(system.time(tAfterqvalNoSign <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", 0.20, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("qvalue"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T, cSign = F)))
save(tAfterqvalNoSign, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterqvalNoSign.RData")
```

#### BH
```{r}
print("tAfterBH")
print(system.time(tAfterBH <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", minInfRV, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("BH"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T)))
save(tAfterBH, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterBH.RData")

print("tAfterBHNoStop")
print(system.time(tAfterBHNoStop <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", -100000, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("BH"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T, cSign = F)))
save(tAfterBHNoStop, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterBHNoStop.RData")

print("tAfterBHNoThresh")
print(system.time(tAfterBHNoSign <- runTreeTermAlphas(tree, yAll, "condition", 0.20, pCutOff = 0.05, pChild = 0.05, runType = c("a"), corr = c("BH"), alphas = c(0.01, 0.05, 0.10), cores = 3, compPThresh = T, cSign = F)))
save(tAfterBHNoSign, file = "environment/brain_sim/tAfterBHNoSign.RData")
```
